评论详情: It has a nice simple elegant look and fits perfectly..

I loved this ring.  When I received it I was amazed at the quality and the classiness of it.  Usually the pictures of jewelry are much nicer than the actual pieces (more on that to come).  This ring actually looked nicer than the pictures, and it was really solid and even a bit weighty.  I was very happy with it.  Then I lost it.Soon after, I was browsing one of the cheapie import sites that sells a ton of cheap everything and you often find yourself Wishing you'd gotten something better... and I found a bunch of ring listings that looked just like this ring.  And I thought - why on earth would I pay what I paid for that ring when I can get the same thing for 1/10th of the price?  So I bought one.  It's not the same ring.  Not even close.  Same basic design, but that's it.  The materials are thinner and cheaper (and not tungsten).  I won't say the new ring looks bad, but it's just not the same and lacks any wow factor.  It looks cheap.  So in this case it's true that you get what you pay for.  This: a very nice, high-quality ring you'll be proud to wear.  That: um... not so much.
Had a black one just like this one but wanted a silver one and like it even better

Purchased this ring last month and it already separated. It looked nice and fit great. Very comfortable. I know it’s not an expensive ring but figured it would have lasted longer than 34 days and just outside the return period.

I bought this as a little surprise for my love,  he's worn tungsten rings for years.  He was so excited with this ring,  he actually wants it to be THE RING. I was expecting to pay a lot more for something for him for forever,  but this was such nice quality. And based on other rings he's had in the same material,  they don't scratch,  dent etc.If he's happy,  I'm happy. Oh,  and bonus- it came in a nice blue ring box!
